page.title: 07The Living Church Tongue
page.content: The population of Tongue is quite small and therefor Church membership is small but attendance at Sunday wor ship is proportionately quite good. There is a Sunday School consisting of mainly up to 6 year olds at the moment and a small but lively Woman' Guild of mainly older women. The{Guild}organ ises{sales, festivals,carol concerts {and other fund raising events}and is a great support to the church financial ly as well as spiritually. The{Sunday {School}uses Scripture Union material and often participates in services. At the moment there is no organisation attached to the church for the teenage group but this will perhaps come in time. Since St Andrews is a church of Scotland it has{Elders}who are the Kirk Session and who with six members of the congregation make up the Congre gational Board and run the church.
